articles.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
articles.content: A closure is the combination of a function and the lexical environment within which that function was declared.

articles.title: A Guide to Flexbox in CSS
articles.content: Flexbox is a powerful layout tool that allows you to design flexible and responsive layouts.

articles.title: Understanding RESTful APIs
articles.content: RESTful APIs follow a set of rules to enable effective client-server communication.

comments.comment: Great explanation on closures, very helpful!
I love using Flexbox in my projects.
This article is a good introduction to RESTful APIs.
